Chapter III

The birth of a tyrant

WHAT IS THE COST OF A LIFE DURING THE DRUG WAR?

The organization cites a high-ranking officer running operations within a unit against drug trafficking, according to whom police are paid at each "confrontation", a term referring to murders made up in legitimate police raids.
